mapper.select: SELECT GR.ID AS id , GR.GROUP_ID AS groupId , GR.REG_DT AS regDt , GR.REQUEST_CONT AS requestCont , SG.GROUP_NM AS groupNm , TM.NAME AS name , CONFIRM_AT AS confirmAt FROM TB_STUDY_GROUP_REQUEST GR INNER JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_ID FROM TB_GROUP_MEMBER GM WHERE GM.ID = #{suserId } AND GROUP_ROLE = 'admin' ) GM ON GR.GROUP_ID = GM.GROUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STUDY_GROUP SG ON GR.GROUP_ID = SG.GROUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER TM ON GR.ID = TM.ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_STUDY_GROUP_REQUEST_RESULT(ID, GROUP_ID, GROUP_ROLE, CONFIRMER, CONFIRM_AT, REG_DT, CONFIRM_CONT) VALUES(#{id }, #{groupId }, #{groupRole }, #{suserId }, #{confirmAt}, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') FROM DUAL), #{confirmCont})
mapper.select: SELECT CURRENT_MEMBER AS currentMember , TOTAL AS total FROM TB_STUDY_GROUP WHERE GROUP_ID = #{groupId }

SELECT SG.GROUP_ID AS groupID , SG.GROUP_NM AS groupNm , SG.GROUP_FOUNDER AS groupFounder , SG.GROUP_BRIEF AS groupBrief , SG.GROUP_EXPLAIN AS groupExplain , SG.TOTAL AS total , SG.CURRENT_MEMBER AS currentMember , SG.REG_DT AS regDt , GM.ID AS id , GM.GROUP_ROLE AS groupRole FROM TB_STUDY_GROUP SG LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GROUP_MEMBER GM ON SG.GROUP_Id = GM.GROUP_ID AND GM.ID = #{suserId }

SELECT GR.ID AS id , GR.GROUP_ID AS groupId , GR.REG_DT AS regDt , GR.REQUEST_CONT AS requestCont , SG.GROUP_NM AS groupNm , TM.NAME AS name , CASE WHEN CONFIRM_AT = 'Y' THEN '가입 승인' WHEN CONFIRM_AT = 'N' THEN '가입 거부' ELSE '대기 중' END AS confirmAt FROM TB_STUDY_GROUP_REQUEST GR LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STUDY_GROUP SG ON GR.GROUP_ID = SG.GROUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER TM ON GR.ID = TM.ID WHERE GR.ID = #{suserId }
